abilities.name: Intimidating Fang
abilities.effect: As long as Granbull is your Active Pokémon, any damage done to your Pokémon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Crushing Blow
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Double Lariat
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.
